channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Sunday, May 09, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 Today 1,624 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 1,633 including changes to previous case numbers between January 7th and May 7th. The current 7 day trend of cases is 1,929, a decrease of -0.8% from the day before. This time last week trend was 1,976. This is a decrease of -2.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 102 Edmonton Zone 53 South Zone 18 Central Zone 19 North Zone 48 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Fri, May 07, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 11213 -750 % of identified cases 44.5% -3.06% Total VOC cases identified 38625 411 Total VOC recovered 27307 1158 Total deaths from VOC 105 3 VOC specimens screened 66137 420 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Sat, May 08, 2021.
